info.name: Data Apis
info.description: IEX Cloud data can be organized into three generic data APIs: time-series, data-tables, and data-points. Each API type is self describing and the docs can be accessed without an API token.

variable.description: The key to use after a call with just a symbol is made

request.description:
Data points are available per symbol and return individual plain text values. Retrieving individual data points is useful for Excel and Google Sheet users, and applications where a single, lightweight value is needed. We also provide update times for some endpoints which allow you to call an endpoint only once it has new data.

To use this endpoint, youâ€™ll first make a free call to list all available data points for your desired symbol, which can be a security or data category.
